hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: Without the Lens of Truth, the Treasure Chest Mini-Game is a 1 out of 32 chance.^Good luck!

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the way of the hero.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is on the path to #the Key#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##Goron City## has #2# major items.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #a Bottom of the Well Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Ice Cavern GS Spinning Scythe Room

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple Big Lava Room Lower Open Door Chest

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #a Purple Rupee# and #a Red Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Purple Rupee#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Ganon's Castle Boss Key#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right hand# is #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Forest Temple Small Key#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Game Key# and #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Pocket Egg#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that shooting a #target in the woods# grants #a Green Rupee#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #the Bottom of the Well#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Forest Temple Small Key#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Spirit Temple#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that plundering #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that racing #Dampé's ghost# rewards...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #Deku Stick Capacity#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that ##the Deku Tree## has #3# major items.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Ganon's Castle Boss Key#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Pocket Egg#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #a Bottom of the Well Small Key# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the path of time.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
